snippet: A selection of Impressionist works can be seen in “Divided Light and Color: American Impressionist Landscapes” at the Bruce Museum in Greenwich, Conn.
abstract: Exhibit Divided Light and Color: American Impressionist Landscapes, on view at the Bruce Museum in Greenwich, Conn, showcases selection of late 19th- and early 20th-century Impressionist paintings by American artists.
lead_paragraph: A selection of Impressionist works can be seen in “Divided Light and Color: American Impressionist Landscapes” at the Bruce Museum in Greenwich, Conn.

headline.seo: American Impressionists Finding Beauty in Land — Review

keywords.value: Bruce Museum of Arts and Science
